description:
The WoW armory app is a convenient way to look at your World of Warcraft character from your touchpad. Features include:

+ Stats and gear view
+ 3D Gear Model viewer
+ Reputation view
+ Talents and glyphs view
+ Favourite characters

Disclaimer This application is not authored, affiliated or endorsed by Activision Blizzard. All trademarks and intellectual property pertaining to the World of Warcraft game itself are the sole and exclusive property of Activision Blizzard or their respective owners. Copyright World of Warcraft, Blizzard Entertainment and Battle.net are trademarks or registered trademarks of Blizzard Entertainment, Inc. in the U.S. and/or other countries.
versionNote:
+ Full character images can now be seen by clicking your character thumbnail

Bug Fixes

- Gear slots will not show gear from previously viewed characters
- Realm names with spaces should now work
